job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtwere looking for a thought leader for our nlu ml efforts for spotify voice come join a growing and diverse team driving the voice interface for the best audio company on the planet delivering music and podcasts to the world ideal candidate has both academic background and industry experience and will be comfortable driving our strategy and vision as we aim for the goal of understanding our users wherever they speak to us in app in the car on external speakers and however they speak to us expertise in dnnsampnbspand multilingual models strongly preferred looking for somebody equally comfortable speaking with engineers product managers and research team partners spotify is an amazing place to work and build your careerand this is your chance to join the bandltpgtltpgtfull job post here httpswwwspotifyjobscomjobsseniormachinelearningengineervoicepersonalizationltpgt
